name: UIPrintInteractionControllerDelegate
desc: An optional set of methods that the delegate of the shared print-interaction controller implements.

items.name: func printInteractionControllerParentViewController(UIPrintInteractionController) -> UIViewController?
items.desc: Returns a parent view controller for managing the printing-options view.

items.name: func printInteractionController(UIPrintInteractionController, choosePaper: [UIPrintPaper]) -> UIPrintPaper
items.desc: Asks the delegate for an object that encapsulates the paper size and printing area for the print job.

items.name: func printInteractionController(UIPrintInteractionController, cutLengthFor: UIPrintPaper) -> CGFloat
items.desc: Asks the delegate for a length to use when cutting the page.

items.name: func printInteractionController(UIPrintInteractionController, chooseCutterBehavior: [Any]) -> UIPrinter.CutterBehavior
items.desc: Asks the delegate for the cutter behavior for the print job.

items.name: func printInteractionControllerWillPresentPrinterOptions(UIPrintInteractionController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the device is about to display the printing-options user interface.

items.name: func printInteractionControllerDidPresentPrinterOptions(UIPrintInteractionController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the device has presented the printing-options user interface.

items.name: func printInteractionControllerWillDismissPrinterOptions(UIPrintInteractionController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the device is about to dismiss the printing-options user interface.

items.name: func printInteractionControllerDidDismissPrinterOptions(UIPrintInteractionController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the device is dismissing the printing-options user interface.

items.name: func printInteractionControllerWillStartJob(UIPrintInteractionController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the print job is about to start.

items.name: func printInteractionControllerDidFinishJob(UIPrintInteractionController)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the print job has ended.

items.name: enum UIPrinter.CutterBehavior
items.desc: Constants that specify the cutter behavior of a roll-fed printer.
